title.rendered: 20+ Best AI Development Companies To Get Innovative and Tech-Driven Solutions

content.rendered:
The worldwide AI market value is predicted to reach $267 billion by 2027. Being an advanced technology, Artificial Intelligence benefits many business verticals in multiple aspects such as reducing operational costs, increasing efficiency, growing revenue, and improving customer experience.

As per Weforum, by 2030 Artificial Intelligence is expected to contribute $15.7 trillion. Due to the increasing usage of AI day by day, the demand for AI developers is constantly rising; this is why now even startups and SMEs are looking forward to getting connected with the best AI development company. 

However, businesses face issues in finding the top AI development service provider as there are “n” numbers of companies offering AI-based services.   

To help you out with this issue, here we have listed the few best AI development companies’ names. We have considered a few important factors to choose the best for you, so let’s first focus on that… 

Things One Should Contemplate To Make Top AI Development Companies List

Here we have listed few factors to list down the best AI development companies‘ names.

  • Total years of experience
  • Employees strength
  • Workfolio
  • Number of satisfied clients
  • Number successfully delivered projects
  • Awards & recognition
  • Clients rating

Observing the factors stated above, we have created the topmost AI development companies name, so you will know further which AI companies are the best to hire AI developers.

Things One Should Contemplate To Make Top AI Development Companies List

I have contemplated a few factors mentioned below to list down the best AI development companies‘ names.

  • Companies total years of experience
  • Employees strength
  • Workfolio
  • Number of satisfied clients
  • Number successfully delivered projects
  • Awards and recognition
  • Clients rating

Observing the factors stated above, I have shortlisted the topmost AI development companies name, so read further to which AI companies are the best to hire AI developers.

List of The Most Trusted AI Development Companies

The AI development companies listed here are well-known organizations and are majorly known for offering in-class tech-driven solutions to diverse industry verticals around the globe. In addition, from the list, you can pick any of these corporations to Hire AI developers.

1. PixelCrayons    

Pixelcrayons is an award-winning AI development company in India. The company offers end-to-end premium software solutions to ISVs, enterprises and digital agencies. Their experts believe in delivering high-quality AI solutions to businesses.       

Solutions rendered by Pixelcrayons: Android App Development, Website Development, AI/ML Development, Digital Marketing, Cross-platform Development, Project Management, Software Test Automation, Data Science, eCommerce App Development, Digital Transformation     

Key Pointers

  • 18+ Total years of experience
  • 650+ Employees strength
  • Hourly rate: $25 – $49 / hr
  • 3 development centers are located in India
  • Client rating: 5.0/5 at Clutch

2. ValueCoders

It is the most trusted and top-notch AI development company offering leading AI-based solutions since 2004. The AI developers of the organization well understand the business requirements and keeping that in mind, they render matching services to them. Moreover, if you want to hire AI developers in India, then ValueCoders can be a great   choice for you.  

Services provided by ValueCoders: Mobile and Web Development, Web Development, Python Developers, Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, Machine Learning, IoT, IT Strategy & Consulting, and more.

Key Pointers

  • 19+ years of domain experience 
  • 500+ employees strength
  • Client rating: 5.0/5 at Clutch
  • 2500+ satisfied clients
  • 97% client retention rate 
  • Hourly pricing: $15 – $40 / hr
  • 4200+ successfully delivered projects
  • Clients: Dubai Police, Capgemini

Read More: How Artificial Intelligence Is Redefining Success Of Digital Transformation Strategies?

3. Day One Technologies 

It is one of the reputed AI development companies. The organization is offering best-in-class AI-based solutions to diverse industry verticals such as retail, eCommerce, healthcare, and so on and moreover helping them in growing.

Service provided by Day One Technologies: Mobile apps, iOS apps, Android apps, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Visualization, UI/UX, Design, AR/VR, Blockchain, Python, Django, Ephereum, Hyperledger, Crypto and so on.

Key Pointers

  • 4+ Total years of experience
  • 51-200 employees strength
  • Hourly rate: $50 – $99 / hr
  • Clients Rating 4.8/5 at Clutch
  • Worked on 35+ projects
  • Happy Clients: Ghurair, BoschKiosk, Loar, Mascafi

4. Softarex Technologies

As a leading IT sector company, Softarex Technologies provides top-class AI development solutions and moreover ensures to meet clients’ expectations in the best possible way. The AI developers of the firm are experienced and excellent at understanding business needs. 

Service proffered by Softarex Technologies: Embedded development, Software outsourcing services, Data mining, Software development, Data Science, Neural Networks, Artificial Intelligence, Food and Restaurants, Machine Learning, IoT and Manufacturing, and so on.

Key Pointers

  • 19+ years of total experience
  • 51-200 employees strength
  • Hourly rate: $25 – $49 / hr
  • Happy Clients: ReadyTech Corp, ArtenSys Srl
  • Client rating: 5.0/5 stars at Clutch
Unlock AI Potential

Leverage our AI development services to transform your business today.

Reach Us

5. ThirdEye Data  

It is the top-rated AI development company offering innovative and succeeding solutions around the world. The AI developers of the organization have great skills in developing leading AI-based applications and software. Moreover, the services granted by the company help various industries in growing.  

Services provided by ThirdEye Data: Big Data, Business Intelligence, Cloud computing, data sciences, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Google Cloud Computing, Azure, Big Data Analytics, Python, Java, and so on.

Key Pointers

  • 10+ years of total experience
  • 51-200 employees strength
  • Hourly rate: $50 – $99 / hr
  • Clients Rating: 4.5/5 stars at Clutch
  • Happy Clients: Amazon, Amgen, Nokia, Symantec

6. Nvidia

It is a top-level AI development company well known for offering leading AI development services around the globe. The AI developers working in the organization use advanced and trending technologies in-app and software development, and this is the reason businesses prefer to hire AI developers from this company.

Services proffered by Nvidia: Artificial Intelligence development, Deep Learning, Virtual Reality, Supercomputing, Robotics, mobile, and web app development, iOS app, Android app, Python, and so on.

Key Pointers

  • 20+ years of in-market experience
  • 10,001+ employees
  • Hourly Rate: $50 – $99 / hr
  • Clients Rating: 4.6/5 at Glassdoor
  • Awards and recognition: Best Workplace

7. DataRobot

DataRobot is the leading and trusted AI development company that provides various innovative services to global enterprises. The AI experts working in this company ensure to meet clients’ demands. Moreover, the firm understands industries’ standards and their key requirements, so according to that, they create and render solutions to them. 

Service provided by DataRobot: Data Science, Statistical Modeling, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Augmented Analytics, Data Prep, Automated Machine Learning, Machine Learning Operations (MLOps), Time Series Modeling, Visual AI, and more.

Key Pointers

  • 8+ years of in-market experience
  • 1,001-5,000 employees strength
  • Clients rating: 4.4/5 at G2
  • Partners: AWS, Cloudera, looker

8. Unicsoft

Unicsoft is the most trusted technology consulting company that offers AI and Blockchain solutions to drive business results for startups and businesses. Their end-to-end approach to implementing AI solutions for businesses begins with an MVP consulting and briefing. They help startups validate ideas, build an MVP, iterate to achieve a product-to-market fit, and scale quickly.

Services Rendered: Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing, Data Science, Big Data, Data Analytics

Key Pointers

  • 15+ years of domain experience
  • 240+ employees strength
  • Top 1 in Blockchain & AI development
  • Clients rating: 4.9/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $50 — $99 / hr
  • Clients: Hoodifood, MakerDAO, Executive Eye, Goforit, Security Dam, Intellica Group, Forte Web Properties, SOSsitter, SeniorDev, Kokoro, TestMax, Digbee, NDCRx

9. Deeper Insights

Deeper Insights is making the seemingly impossible a reality for companies on their digital transformation and product innovation journeys. From finance to healthcare, from market research to media monitoring, they can help your people make better decisions. They work together with companies like yours to help deliver successful ML and AI projects to make a real impact on business value.

Services Rendered: Artificial Intelligence, Custom Software Development, BI & Big Data Consulting & SI, AI Solution Development, Machine Learning Engineering, MLOps/DevOps, AI Strategic Consulting, Data Science Consulting

Key Pointers

  • 7+ years of domain experience
  • 45+ employees strength
  • Client rating: 5.0/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $50 — $99 / hr
  • Clients: Jones Lang-Lasalle, Deloitte, Breast Cancer Now, IAC, Muscular Dystrophy UK, Interprefy, Revival Health, Smith + Nephew, BetConnect, Datore, DACS

10. Tooploox

Tooploox is a software development company that offers cutting-edge solutions for startups and companies. They focus on long-term partnerships and products that improve people’s lives. Although originally a mobile workshop, Tooploox grew rapidly as a company of over one hundred people and has since embraced and spanned more fields of software engineering viz. AI (ML, CV, NLP).

Services Rendered: Artificial Intelligence, Custom Software Development, Mobile App Development, advanced AI app development

Key Pointers

  • 9+ years of domain experience
  • 240+ employees strength
  • Clients rating: 4.9/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $50 — $99 / hr
  • Clients: June, Group Nine Media, Voyage

11. Intellias

Intellias is a global software engineering and digital consulting partner providing solutions to Fortune 500 companies and leading technology innovators. With more than 2,000 experienced specialists, we offer solutions as a software development company to Fortune 500 vendors and help leading technology innovators create successful software products in a variety of domains.

Intellias has been featured on the 2019 Global Outsourcing 100 list by IAOP, recognized by Inc. 5000, and recognized at the GSA UK Awards.

Services Rendered: Custom Software Development, Artificial Intelligence, BI & Big Data Consulting & SI, Software Engineering, Solution Operations, Digital Consulting, Advanced app development

Key Pointers

  • 19+ years of domain experience
  • 10000+ employees strength
  • Clients rating: 4.9/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $50 — $99 / hr
  • Clients: HERE Technologies, Siemens, Deloitte, LG Electronics, KIA, Nokia, Roche, Lean Business Services, Anglo-Gulf Trade Bank

Read Further: Artificial Intelligence Vs. Machine Learning Vs. Deep Learning: New Ethics of Future Advancement!

12. Neoteric

Neoteric is a technology partner for those who want to innovate; they believe that technology must be leveraged if it adds an exponential factor to their business. So, you can join their team and build an impressive product together. Working on more than 100 projects on five continents as a technology partner and building 3 of their own startups founded by VC, they went from being a subcontracting company to a technology partner.

Services Rendered: Artificial Intelligence, Web Development, Custom Software Development, Product Design

Key Pointers

  • 16+ years of domain experience
  • 240+ employees strength
  • Clients rating: 4.9/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $50 — $99 / hr
  • Clients: Siemens, Nestle, The World Bank, Liveramp, 4com, Vectra, LunchBadger, Client.io, Jeppesen, Arvata, Apporchid, RapidSOS, Appoint.ly, Hotailors, Qoreboard, CommonAreas, Egain

13. Nexocode

As an innovative IT partner based in Poland, they combine strong technical skills and strategic vision. They have built Nexocode on trust, responsiveness, and communication. Being a Teal Organization allows everyone to participate in the decision-making process. They offer intelligent artificial intelligence solutions that can elevate your business.

With their machine learning developers, MLOps, and expert project managers in AI projects, you can confidently achieve successful results with digital transformation. Their offerings include advanced AI development services for every need and phase of the AI lifecycle.

Services Rendered: Artificial Intelligence, Custom Software Development, Digital Transformation, Custom AI Development Services, MLOps, Machine Learning Consulting

Key Pointers

  • 4+ years of domain experience
  • 45+ employees strength
  • Clients rating: 4.9/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $50 — $99 / hr
  • Clients: Google Developers Experts, Predica, Jetstream by Leavetown, MaxiPizza

14. Zegami

Zegami offers a full service, enabling leaders to deliver AI transformation faster and more accurately. Their team and their tools become your data science complement to create, improve and validate machine learning models that will drive your business or your products.

They have accumulated years of experience and expertise in AI, working alongside researchers, data scientists, and the subject matter experts of AI and ML projects that use images, text, and structured data.

Services Rendered: Artificial Intelligence, BI & Big Data Consulting & SI, Custom Software Development, MVP development, Data science team augmentation, Model performance testing, and validation, Deep subject matter expertise

Key Pointers

  • 5+ years of domain experience
  • 49+ employees strength
  • Clients rating: 4.9/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $50 — $99 / hr
  • Clients: University of Oxford, Ebbon intelligence, APPF

15. Toptal

Toptal is a splendid network of the world’s best business, design, and technology talent that enables companies to scale their teams on demand. They are problem solvers who value integrity and connect progressive organizations with the talent economy. They create custom solutions and partner with clients on everything from large-scale application delivery with entire teams to smaller projects supported by specialized experts.

Services Rendered: Custom Software Development, Artificial Intelligence, Mobile App Development

Key Pointers

  • 11+ years of domain experience
  • 9999+ employees strength
  • Clients rating: 4.7/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $100 — $149 / hr
  • Clients: J.P. Morgan, Zendesk, Artsy, IDEO, Pfizer

16. Diffco

Diffco is one of the leading mobile app development companies building robust mobile apps and artificial intelligence solutions. For startups and companies, they work on the complete creation of the project from ideation to sophisticated technological implementation. Having more than 12 years of experience and more than 1000 projects launched successfully, they can deliver projects of any complexity without problems, ensuring best practices and using industry-leading technologies.

Services Rendered: Mobile App Development, Artificial Intelligence, Custom Software Development, Computer vision, Machine learning

Key Pointers

  • 13+ years of domain experience
  • 45+ employees strength
  • Client rating: 5.0/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $50 — $99 / hr
  • Clients: FREDD, ORB Intelligence (Acquired by Dun & Bradstreet), L.E. Solutions, Mi3 Security (Acquired by ZIMPERIUM), FlashGrid, FoodRocket, Instreamatic, LerBee, Twinkle Star, NCRIC, FOLA, Genius One, FinalPrice, PHEW, QuestRoom, Aerostarter, Clovitek, Nokia care, Centerlight, GLFG, ORB Intelligence.
Next-Gen AI Solutions

Step into the future with our next-generation AI development services.

Reach Us

17. CHI Software

CHI Software addresses business problems using artificial intelligence and machine learning. Its developers have proven AI / ML experience and create models based on the latest technologies. No hassle, just real-world use cases. Through cutting-edge technology, on-time delivery, and strong engineering culture, they help companies achieve bigger goals and impact people’s lives like never before.

Their clients trust them to help them solve real-life problems through services like technology consulting, product development, and delivery services.

Services Rendered: Custom Software Development, Artificial Intelligence, Mobile App Development, Product Development, IT Consulting

Key Pointers

  • 15+ years of domain experience
  • 990+ employees strength
  • Client rating: 5.0/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $50 — $99 / hr
  • Clients: Atlassian Jira, MediaMarkt, Sabre, Jabil, Microsoft, PrismTech, Dressler Consulting, Cyren, BTO, ClimaCell

18. Achievion Solutions

Achievion Solutions offers AI-powered smart mobile and web solutions to help organizations achieve previously impossible goals. Its AI-centric delivery process, ACHIEVE, ensures the success of every AI project. And its AI Accuracy Guarantee provides an additional level of confidence in the final product.

It has successfully designed and delivered sophisticated solutions to clients ranging from startups to midsize businesses and government agencies.

Services Rendered: Artificial Intelligence, Mobile App Development, Web Development, AI strategy consulting, Enterprise apps development

Key Pointers

  • 8+ years of domain experience
  • 49+ employees strength
  • Clients rating: 4.9/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $50 — $99 / hr
  • Clients: National Institutes of Health, Social Tables, Yoga.com, NVLSP, Telnet, Pay4SchoolStuff, ItsOnMe.com

19. AndPlus

AndPlus is a technology development and consulting firm that helps clients accelerate digital transformation by bridging the gap between strategy & execution. By fusing deep technical and business expertise with a custom agile development process, they help their clients quickly implement digital transformation strategies that achieve optimal results with less risk.

Their dedicated team of seasoned digital product experts thrives on solving complex customer challenges and delivering innovative technology solutions that drive customer success every time.

Services Rendered: Mobile App Development, Web Development, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Product Strategy and Design, iOS and Android Development, IoT Application Development, Firmware Development, Manual and Automated Testing, Cross-Platform Mobile Development, User Experience and UI Design

Key Pointers

  • 12+ years of domain experience
  • 240+ employees strength
  • Clients rating: 4.9/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $150 — $199 / hr
  • Clients: Bloomberg, ESPN, MIT, Cambridge Mobile Telematics, LinkAKC, Honeywell, Cognex, Predicata, Crunched Accounting, NexRev, Goodstart Genetics, Onset Computers, Harvard School of Public Health, Medica, Phoenix Controls, AEMC, Arthromeda, Party Valet, CA Pager, DKF Solutions, VGSI, Stratcomm, Harvey, PrismHR, Phantom Gourmet

20. Belitsoft

Belitsoft is a leading software development company located in Eastern Europe, Belarus (Minsk). They are a reliable partner for their clients in the United States, the United Kingdom, Europe, including small businesses and companies with thousands of employees.

Its developers create custom software for startups and large companies in the US, UK, Europe, Israel, and elsewhere. They do their best to provide you with the best software development services. Their specialists are more concerned with delivering a usable product, than focusing only on the technical aspects.

Services Rendered: Custom Software Development, Artificial Intelligence, Web Development, Mobile development, Quality Assurance, Manual & Automated software testing, IT Consulting

Key Pointers

  • 17+ years of domain experience
  • 999+ employees strength
  • Clients rating: 4.9/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $25 — $49 / hr
  • Clients: Technicolor SA, ElearningForce, Insly, IDT Corporation, CRIMSON, NEDAP, Berkeley University, Aalborg University, Ticken.nl

21. Intetics Inc.

Intetics is one of the best global technology companies providing custom software application development, distributed professional teams, software product quality assurance, and “all things digital” solutions built with SMAC, RPA, AI / ML, IoT, blockchain, and GIS / UAV / LBS. technologies. Its main strength is the design of software products under conditions of incomplete specifications.

They have extensive experience in education, healthcare, logistics, life sciences, finance, insurance, communications, and custom ERP, CRM, smart automation, and geospatial solutions and operate from 11 offices in 6 countries: USA, Germany, UK, Belarus, Poland, Ukraine.

Services Rendered: Custom Software Development, Mobile App Development, Web Development, IoT development, Machine learning & Artificial Intelligence

Key Pointers

  • 26+ years of domain experience
  • 999+ employees strength
  • Clients rating: 4.8/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $25 — $49 / hr
  • Clients: Encyclopaedia Britannica, SugarCRM, Snap-On, Würth, Cengage Learning, Burda Digital, Symantec, Spreadshirt, Rupp und Hubrach, Mettler Toledo, Modlin, Adorama

22 Miquido

Miquido is a software development partner which is aiming to solve business challenges with cutting-edge technology and using data-driven research. With 10 years of professional experience, they know exactly how to transform bold business ideas into exceptional digital products.

They have delivered over 150 solutions for Fintech, eCommerce, healthcare, entertainment, and many other industries, and 9/10 of their projects come from referrals. They are building it and preparing their clients’ businesses to reap the greatest benefits from the technology-dominated world.

Services Rendered: Mobile App Development, Web Development, Artificial Intelligence, Product Design & Strategy, UX/UI Design, Data Science, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, NLP, Market research, Android, iOS and Cross-platform apps

Key Pointers

  • 10+ years of domain experience
  • 249+ employees strength
  • Clients rating: 4.8/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $50 — $99 / hr
  • Clients: Skyscanner, Abbey Road Studios, BNP Paribas, Santander Bank, Herbalife, Play, TUI, Empik, Onkyo Music, HelloFresh, Pando, Klassik Radio, HID, Nestle, Aviva, AXA, SBAB, Nextbank, Qubit, Imagination Technologies, 7digital, Goodlord, Lepaya, Global Eagle, Shepper, PZU, Brainly, Picniic, Which?, VhedaHealth, Concirrus, MQA

23. Conlan Scientific

The company offers financial data science and machine learning development services from downtown Bethesda, MD. Their ecosystem of financial data at the terrabyte scale is ready to apply to your project. Augment your existing insights for superior predictive performance.

They carefully examine their data sources and actively maintain only the most valuable data assets. They serve private market investors, lenders, and financial technology companies, as well as public market investors.

Services Rendered: Artificial Intelligence, Financial AI consulting, Financial data science, Fraud detection, Risk management, Investment evaluation

Key Pointers

  • 6+ years of domain experience
  • 9+ employees strength
  • Client rating: 5.0/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $150 — $199 / hr
  • Clients: Sames Auto Group, 721 Investment Systems, Klover Financial, David S Brown Real Estate Developers, U.S. Dept of Health and Human Services (HHS), Signal Consulting Group, Insignia Federal Group, Center for Responsive Politics

24. Trigma

Trigma is a well-recognized digital technology service provider and consulting company that enables clients to create and execute strategies for digital transformation. They create innovative, research-based digital experiences that balance form and function and bring ideas to life.

They are a leading provider of custom software development and consulting services. Combined with smart technology, extensive experience, and intelligence, they can bring your business to a global audience. Their team of experts, located in 3 global locations, is our greatest asset.

Services Rendered: Mobile App Development, Web Development, Artificial Intelligence, IoT app development, DevOps development, Machine learning

Key Pointers

  • 12+ years of domain experience
  • 249+ employees strength
  • Client rating: 5.0/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: < $25 / hr
  • Clients: UN, Samsung, Abott, Whirlpool, Shell, Disney, British Council, Hero Moto Corp, Alere, Panasonic, Expert Rating, Government of India, Micromax, Walmart, History

25. HatchWorks Technologies

As an award-winning product team, they specialize in creating innovative and future-proof software products from ideation to launch and beyond. They offer product strategy, UX / UI development, and design services, as well as managed cloud application services.

Their team of product experts works closely with you to “co-visualize” your product journey and help you navigate the often unpredictable and complex E2E product lifecycle. HatchWorks is headquartered in Atlanta, GA, with offices in Chicago, IL, and San Jose, Costa Rica, our nearshore construction center.

Services Rendered: Custom Software Development, BI & Big Data Consulting & SI, Cloud Consulting & SI, Software strategy & design, Data management and analytics, Machine learning & AI

Key Pointers

  • 5+ years of domain experience
  • 249+ employees strength
  • Clients rating: 4.9/5 at Clutch
  • Hourly pricing: $100 — $149 / hr
  • Clients: AT&T, Diebold Nixdorf, Cricket Wireless, Charter Communications, Anthem, Kimberly Clark, Rollins, Cox Communications, Kemper, FleetCor Technologies, Integrated Care Solutions, TrueBlue (PeopleScout & PeopleReady), Stanley Black & Decker, Zimmet Healthcare, WealthAbility, Spring Hills, Viasat, Capital Choice Financial Group
AI Solutions, Simplified

Experience the simplicity of implementing AI with our expert guidance.

Reach Us

26. MobiDev

MobiDev is the best AI development company that creates and offers business-driven solutions. The company focuses on offering innovative AI development services which help businesses meet their requirements. Moreover, the company’s AI developers are so talented that they can resolve any techno-driven issues within very little time.             

Solutions rendered by MobiDev: Android Application Development, Web App Development, Ruby Development, UI/UX design, JavaScript Development, Cross-platform Development, Project Management, Software Test Automation, Data Science, Internet of Things (IoT), Artificial Intelligence and more.     

Key Pointers

  • 11+ Total years of experience
  • 250 – 999 Employees strength
  • Hourly rate: $25 – $49 / hr
  • 3 development centers are located in Ukraine
  • Client rating: 5.0/5 at Clutch

Ending Words

Making choices from the long list of AI development companies can be challenging, so to help you out with this, we have compared all companies and found that ValueCoders, MobiDev, and Softarex Technologies companies are great at offering services at an affordable rate, so you can choose any of the companies from these three selected companies to hire AI developers.
